Page header introducing “Augmented Workforce Solutions”—how MezTal helps US companies build dedicated remote teams in Guadalajara and Mexico City for scalable, flexible staffing.
Pain points solved: Overcoming US talent shortages, reducing costs by ~40%, rapid team scaling, and ensuring cultural and operational alignment.
Roles we place: Accountants, IT specialists, Software Engineers, Customer Support Reps, HR Coordinators, Marketing Analysts, Admin Assistants.
Sample outcomes: Faster hiring cycles, improved retention, increased productivity, seamless US team integration, and measurable cost savings.
Why Guadalajara and Mexico City: Large, English-proficient talent pool, strong universities, convenient flights, overlapping business hours with the US, proven cultural fit.
MezTal’s engagement model: Discovery call, role scoping, talent vetting, onboarding, ongoing HR/IT/payroll support, flexible scaling, full client control over hires.
Common questions: How does MezTal source talent? What are typical team sizes? How does client oversight work? How does MezTal handle payroll/compliance?
Clear CTA to “Hire Talent” (lead form), with secondary CTA to “Contact Us” for custom inquiries.

Hero section with headline: “Build your Finance & Accounting team in Guadalajara and Mexico City.” Subhead: “40% cost savings, English-proficient talent, full client control. Overlapping business hours with the US.” Primary CTA: “Book a consult.” Secondary CTA: “View finance roles.”

Pain points solved: Difficulty finding affordable, high-quality finance talent in the US, turnover, lack of scalability, and compliance challenges.
Roles we place: Accountants, Controllers, AP/AR Specialists, Payroll Specialists, Financial Analysts, Bookkeepers, CPAs.
Sample outcomes: 40% average cost savings, streamlined month-end close, improved compliance, rapid team scaling, seamless collaboration in US business hours.
Why Guadalajara and Mexico City: Large pool of finance graduates, strong cultural alignment, English proficiency, proximity and easy travel to the US, similar work culture.
Step-by-step process: Discovery call → Role scoping → Candidate vetting & English assessment → Client interviews → Onboarding & ongoing support.
Engagement model: Dedicated remote team, client retains hire/fire/bonus control, MezTal handles HR, IT, office, payroll, and recruiting.
Top FAQs: Security/compliance, English levels, client control, time zone alignment, onboarding process.
Client testimonial from a finance/healthcare leader; optional employee voice.
Strong CTA to “Book a consult” and “Hire Finance Talent.”
